description: Remove backgrounds from images using BRIA AI API with URL-based and file-based workflows for seamless integration.
polls-the-background-removal-api-to-retr: Polls the background removal API to retrieve the processed image URL once the job is complete
the-request-id-obtained-from-the-submit-: The request ID obtained from the submit background removal task
interval-between-polling-attempts-in-sec: Interval between polling attempts in seconds (default: 2)
url-of-the-processed-image-with-backgrou: URL of the processed image with background removed
final-status-of-the-background-removal-j: Final status of the background removal job
submits-an-image-to-the-background-remov: Submits an image to the background removal API and returns a request ID for tracking the job status
url-of-the-image-to-remove-background-fr: URL of the image to remove background from
the-request-id-returned-by-the-api-for-t: The request ID returned by the API for tracking the background removal job
remove-background-from-a-local-image-fil: Remove background from a local image file and save the processed result.
url-of-the-image-to-remove-background-fr: URL of the image to remove background from
interval-between-polling-attempts-in-sec: Interval between polling attempts in seconds (default: 2)
path-of-the-successfully-downloaded-file: Path of the successfully downloaded file
remove-background-from-an-image-url-and-: Remove background from an image URL and return the processed image URL.
url-of-the-image-to-remove-background-fr: URL of the image to remove background from
interval-between-polling-attempts-in-sec: Interval between polling attempts in seconds (default: 2)
url-of-the-processed-image-with-backgrou: URL of the processed image with background removed
